InputType Data Type

A type of input field in the system.

Values
value description
boolean A boolean field.
datepicker A date picker field.
multiselect A multiselect field. Multiple values can be selected from a picklist. The valid picklist values are stored in the fieldDefDTO (values property)
select A select field. A single value can be selected from the picklist. The valid picklist values are stored in the fieldDefDTO (values property)
text A free-form text field (single line).
textarea A free-form text field (multiple lines).
number A number (integer) value.
multiselect_incident Internal use only.
multiselect_task Internal use only.
select_owner Internal use only.
multiselect_members Internal use only.
datetimepicker A date/time picker field.
select_user A user selection field.
none No input type specified. This is used for display-only fields.
